meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a snout.
meanings.sent1: The dog's snoutish face was adorable.
meanings.sent2: The pig's snoutish nose was covered in mud.
meanings.sent3: The snoutish squirrel kept sniffing around for nuts.
meanings.sent4: Her snoutish curiosity led her to investigate every corner of the room.
meanings.sent5: The snoutish shape of the vase made it unique among the collection.

meanings.definition: Having the appearance or behavior of a snout.
meanings.sent1: The dragon's snoutish roar echoed through the valley.
meanings.sent2: The anteater's snoutish tongue flicked out to catch ants.
meanings.sent3: The snoutish car alarm blared loudly in the quiet street.
meanings.sent4: His snoutish determination to win the race was evident in his focused expression.
meanings.sent5: The snoutish design of the mask made it perfect for the costume party.
